declaration.code: func setPendingDatasetRequestWith(_ params: MTRThreadBorderRouterManagementClusterSetPendingDatasetRequestParams, completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)

overview:
## Discussion

This command SHALL be used to set or update the pending Dataset of the Thread network to which the Border Router is connected, if the Border Router supports PANChange Feature.

# setPendingDatasetRequestWith(_:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Command SetPendingDatasetRequest

## Declaration

```swift
func setPendingDatasetRequestWith(_ params: MTRThreadBorderRouterManagementClusterSetPendingDatasetRequestParams, completion: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func setPendingDatasetRequestWith(_ params: MTRThreadBorderRouterManagementClusterSetPendingDatasetRequestParams) async throws
```

## Discussion

This command SHALL be used to set or update the pending Dataset of the Thread network to which the Border Router is connected, if the Border Router supports PANChange Feature.
